title: ICSIL Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Nursing Attendant Posts
description: Intelligent Communication Systems India Limited (ICSIL) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Nursing Attendant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 08th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the ICSIL Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given b...
